show_name: Dragon Quest Saga: Emblem of Roto (movie)
other_title: Dragon Quest Retsuden: Roto no Monshō (Japanese)
ドラゴンクエスト列伝　ロトの紋章 (Japanese)
plot: Arusu is a young boy who ends up with the task of dealing with a hazardous plant that has arrived from a meteorite and is killing the wildlife surrounding it.
opening_theme: "Shōnen no Hane" (少年の羽) by Akino Arai
